name: Summary
reknown: Short decription about experience, skills and character
contentData:
• +4 years of experience in developing websites including front-end and back-end
  • Experienced in using php MVC frameworks (Codeiginter, Laravel and Cakephp)
  • Good deal with JavaScript and JavaScript Frameworks (jQuery, Ajax, Emberjs and Angularjs)
  • Have a strong knowledge in web design including CSS , CSS framework (bootstrap and foundation) and Photoshop
  • Worked with SEO specialists and gain experience
  • Self-motivated, self-starter , duty bound and a highly committed team player with strong conceptual knowledge of web development
  • Experienced at analyzing employer' needs and helping him to achieve goals through professional project management.
  • Worked in a team and have leadership character
  • Quiet, non-fanatic, finely deal with the team and over my career there are no black points

name: Experience
contentData:
Senior Web Developer, SEO Era

Egyptian Company , its size : 20 – 30 employees

August 2014 - Now

Responsible for development department in the company involving meeting clients and discuss with them their desires , and I try hardly to show them their desires in the application , built over 10 web applications

Web Developer, Lean Consulting

French Company has a branch in Egypt , its size : 15 – 25 employees

December 2013 - August 2014

Responsible for development department , involve large backend system which considered a data entry for 1200 websites in 4 servers , all 1200 websites have same style and design and develop but with different content and linked them to get visitors (SEO)

My Achievements in that system :

  • Increasing productivity of the system which data entries can input 12,000 products in 5 days
  • Stability of the system
  • Security of the system
  • System Improvement and development from time to another

Addition of that I built 2 Web applications . First one called decoreduc.com , it's a search engine website which search in large database include 72,000 products.
Second one called prixmania.fr , it's online negotiations for products which user can ask if he can buy a product with less cost.
In the experience certificate, it was written 'he have a strong knowledge in web programming and ability to produce applications with high quality and performance'

Freelance Web Developer

During my study

May 2011- November 2013

build websites for clients during my study, built 4 website
